meta.title: WiseFood
meta.description: WiseFood - Your Ultimate Foodie Companion: Discover, Share, and Savor Culinary Delights!

dashboard.encouragement: Your personalized wellness journey starts here
dashboard.signInPrompt: Please sign in to access your dashboard
dashboard.title: Dashboard

auth.loginPrompt: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.ssoDescription: You will be redirected to our secure login portal
auth.ssoRegistrationDescription: Create your account through our secure authentication portal.
auth.singleSignOn: Single sign-on across all WiseFood services

hero.description: Transform your food choices with smart, AI-powered tools towards healthier and more sustainable living.

features.heading: Built for
features.subheading: Discover the powerful features that make WiseFood the ultimate nutritional companion.

scientific.title: Scientific Knowledge
scientific.description: Access cutting-edge nutrition research made simple. We translate complex scientific studies into clear, actionable insights.

personalized.title: Personalized For You
personalized.description: Every recommendation adapts to your unique profile. Your dietary preferences, allergies, and goals shape all suggestions.

culinary.title: Culinary Inspiration
culinary.description: Discover recipes matching your taste and health goals. From quick weeknight meals to gourmet dishes, find new favorites.

ai.title: AI-Powered Insights
ai.description: Smart algorithms analyze your eating habits continuously. Get proactive suggestions to make better food choices daily.

planning.title: Meal Planning
planning.description: Cooking for all household members has never been made easier. Receive meal plans suggestions that keep everyone happy.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Beautiful dashboards visualize your health journey clearly. Celebrate milestones and stay motivated with smart tracking.

steps.heading: Simple
steps.subheading: Get started in minutes and transform your relationship with food.

profile.title: Create Your Profile
profile.description: Share your dietary preferences, health goals, and any restrictions. Getting started takes just a couple of minutes.

recommendations.title: Get Recommendations
recommendations.description: Our AI analyzes your profile instantly and delivers personalized meal plans, recipes, and nutritional guidance.

track.title: Track & Improve
track.description: Log your meals and monitor your progress over time. Watch as our system learns and adapts to serve you better.

cta.heading: Ready to transform your
cta.description: Join a community of users building healthier habits with WiseFood. Start your journey today and discover a smarter way to nourish your body.

recipeWrangler.title: RecipeWrangler
recipeWrangler.subtitle: Discover personalized recipes tailored to your nutritional goals and environmental impact

search.placeholder: Ask for recipes (e.g., 'pasta recipes', 'quick vegan meals')...

analyzer.title: AI Recipe Analyzer
analyzer.description: Paste any recipe URL or ingredients list to get instant nutritional analysis
analyzer.placeholder: Paste recipe URL, ingredients, or recipe text here...

results.noResultsMessage: Try adjusting your search or browse our categories below

detail.sustainabilityMessage: This recipe has a sustainability score based on ingredient sourcing and preparation methods.

foodChat.title: FoodChat
foodChat.description: Your AI nutrition assistant. Ask about meal planning, nutritional info, dietary advice, or recipe suggestions.
foodChat.sendPlaceholder: Ask about nutrition, meal plans, recipes...
foodChat.sendFirst: Send a message to get started
foodChat.noMealPlanHint: Ask the assistant to generate a meal plan

suggested.mealPlan: Can you suggest a meal plan for weight management?
suggested.highProtein: What are some high-protein vegetarian meal ideas?
suggested.gutHealth: What foods are good for gut health?
suggested.reduceSugar: How can I reduce my sugar intake without sacrificing taste?
